Dihedral Potentials

Detailed Description

template<class Interaction>
class DdMd::DihedralPotentialImpl< Interaction >

Implementation template for a DihedralPotential.

Member Function Documentation

template<class Interaction >
void DdMd::DihedralPotentialImpl< Interaction >::readParam ( std::istream &  in) [virtual]

Read potential energy parameters.

This method reads the dihedral potential Interaction parameter block. Before calling Interaction::readParam(), it passes simulation().nDihedralType() to Interaction::setNAtomType().

Reimplemented from Util::ParamComposite.

) const [inline, virtual]

Returns potential energy for one dihedral.

0 2 3 o o----o \ / o 1

Parameters:
R1bond vector from atom 0 to 1
R2bond vector from atom 1 to 2
R3bond vector from atom 2 to 3
typetype of dihedral

Returns derivatives of energy with respect to bond vectors forming the dihedral group.

Parameters:
R1bond vector from atom 0 to 1
R2bond vector from atom 1 to 2
R3bond vector from atom 2 to 3
F1force along R1 direction (upon return)
F2force along R2 direction (upon return)
F3force along R2 direction (upon return)
typetype of dihedral
